tool.help:
.. class:: infomark
**What it does** This tool handles the outliers from the selected columns of the given dataset.
-----
**Inputs** HeatMap * **--infile** Input data frame as a tabular file. * **--column_list** List of columns to detect outliers * **--method** Method to select for outlier removal, [drop, replace] * **--upper_quartile** Upper quartile value (default 75) * **--lower_quartile** "Lower quartile value (default 25)" * **--multiplier_constant** IQR multiplier constant (default 1.5)
**Outputs** * Returns a tabular file with outlier removed/replaced with medians
